bLoadDefaultMapOnStop: Whether to reload the default map when StopReplay is called.

methods.name: GetActiveReplayName
methods.doc:
Get current recording/playing replay name

@return FString Name of relpay (session id, file name, etc)

methods.name: GetReplayCurrentTime
methods.doc:
Get current recording/playing replay time

@return float Current recording/playback time in seconds

methods.name: RequestCheckpoint
methods.doc: Request a checkpoint write, if currently recording.
